alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 28 at 2:35PM PDT until April 29 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southwestern Humboldt, Northern Humboldt Interior, Northern Trinity, Northwestern Mendocino Interior, Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Lake County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated, normally colder locations may drop below freezing for a few hours prior to sunrise. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Humboldt
